issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Phone>Sound>Remote streaming, I Started the test and began the streaming.I then pressed the "Pause streaming" button. After the stream paused, I pressed "Unpause streaming". Nothing happened. 

This also occurs with 1.7.1. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Launch KS, built with 1.7.2
2) Navigate to Phone>Sound>Remote streaming
3) Start the stream
4) While the stream is running, pause the stream
5) Attempt to unpause the stream

Result:
Nothing happens and the stream does not continue

Expected results:
The stream continues from the point where is was paused

Notes:
Also occurs with 1.7.1
fields.summary: KitchenSink: unpausing a paused stream fails to function in Phone>Sound>Remote streaming

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
